thing-type.label: YKFCON Smart Living Keyfree Smart Lock
thing-type.description: Smart Living Keyfree Smart Lock<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe Yale Keyfree Connected smart lock gives you freedom to secure your home without the need for a key. Simple to use, you now have complete control on how you unlock your door.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtEnter Master Code #</li&gt <li&gtEnter 7 #</li&gt <li&gtKeypad model will flash BLUE; press ‘1#’ to join the network ; lock will beep three times to indicate lock has joined the network successfully.</li&gt <li&gtTouch model voice response will say” Network Mode”; lock screen will display ‘1’; select ‘1#’ to join the network . Voice response will say “Joining the wireless network” and then “Completed” when lock has successfully joined the network.</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtEnter Master Code #</li&gt <li&gtEnter 7 #</li&gt <li&gtKeypad model will flash RED; press ‘3#’ to leave the network ; lock will beep three times to indicate lock has left the network successfully.</li&gt <li&gtTouch model voice response will say” Network Mode”; lock screen will display ‘3’; select ‘3#’ to leave the network . Voice response will say “Exit the wireless network” and then “Completed” when lock has successfully left the network</li&gt </ol&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Audio Volume
parameter.description: Sets the volume level of the beeps and voice prompts<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt1 = Silent</p&gt <p&gt2 = Low</p&gt <p&gt3 = High</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Auto Re-lock
parameter.description: When enabled, the unit will automatically re-lock<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 = Off</p&gt <p&gt255 = On</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Re-lock Time
parameter.description: Time after unlocking that the device will lock

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Wrong Code Entry Limit
parameter.description: The number of invalid tries before the lock shutdowns and sends an alarm

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Language
parameter.description: Language used by the voice prompts<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt1 = English</p&gt <p&gt2 = Spanish</p&gt <p&gt3 = French</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Shutdown Time
parameter.description: Number of times the device is locked out after the invalid retries are exceeded

parameter.name: config_8_1
parameter.label: 8: Operating Mode
parameter.description: Sets if the unit operates normal, or disables keypad and Z-Wave lock/unlock<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 = Normal</p&gt <p&gt1 = Vacation Mode (User Codes Disabled)</p&gt <p&gt2 = Privacy Mode (User Codes and ZWave Codes Disabled</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: 1: Alarm Reports
parameter.description: Alarm reports are sent out to all devices in the association group
